Signal (pysar.signal)¶

1D and 2D signal processing routines

Functions¶

Boxcar filters (pysar.signal.boxfilter)¶

boxcar1d(data,window,null=None,nullset=None) 1d boxcar filter
boxcar2d(...) 2d boxcar filter

Median filters (pysar.signal.medfilter)¶

medfilt2d(data,window,null=None,numthrd=8) 2d median filter

Butterworth filters (pysar.signal.butters)¶

butter(data[, low, high, dt, df, order, ...]) Butterworth filter
bandpass(data, low, high[, dt, df, order, ...]) Butterworth bandpass filter
lowpass(data, high[, dt, df, order, zero_phase]) Butterworth lowpass filter
highpass(data, low[, dt, df, order, zero_phase]) Butterworth highpass filter

Specialty filters (pysar.signal.special)¶

taper(data[, percent]) Cosine taper
conefilter2d(data,window,dx=1.,dy=1.,null=None) 2d cone filter

Scripts¶

None
